website_summaries.verdict: Buyers looking for a set of unbreakable wine glasses will find their match in this sleek model.
pros: Stainless steel construction for supreme durability
Larger build holds 18 ounces of wine
Tumbler design keeps wine at room temperature, or cool if chilled
Great for picnics, traveling, and camping
cons: A few buyers complained of the glasses leaving a metal aftertaste

website_summaries.verdict: Lauded for their temperature retention and quality construction, these smaller wine glasses are a great choice for wine enthusiasts.
pros: High-quality steel makes for a smooth finish and comfortable feel in hand
Steel construction keeps wine at desired temperature
Many owners are impressed by the set's beautiful, modern design
cons: A few owners complained of the wine having a metal-like after taste

customer_reviews.title: Although good size, can cut between your fingers when washing ...
customer_reviews.text: Although good size , can cut between your fingers when washing because the opening is small for your hand to fit inside am sure wash it well.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Stained in one use
customer_reviews.text: All of my cups are metal so I know how to treat metal cups and houseware. This cup is all stained after one wine used. I mean it is still usable I just would not offer this to a girl I am trying to date. The red/brown stains from the wine make it look like it has never been clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control - could cause a cut lip!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! the top rim of one of the "glasses" was sharp, very sharp! You could have easily cut your lip on it. I returned this set!
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Gave this as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my daughter in law. Christmas came & went and I had actually forgotten about even purchasing them until I was looking in my orders after Christmas accounting the money I spent. There they were & I couldn't remember her opening them. I called next door to my Mother's home & yes they were there. I retrieved them, curiosity killed this cat. After opening them I didn't want to give them away....I immediately went on Amazon and sent her some to her address, she loves the tumblers; I love them too. They do sweat some, I suppose because there is no lid but , they are solid and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how small these look. I can't imagine how small the 12 oz ones would be! This is a good cup for wine, something not cold. Because they are not double walled if you put something cold in them they sweat like crazy! I can't believe how badly they sweat from something chilled being poured inside. I would probably not purchase again because the top is too small to allow a wine to breathe properly and they are not versatile at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. I kept breaking wine glasses (not while drinking, but washing them in the morning). I’m terrible with stemmed glasses also. These are PERFECT because they’re easy to clean, shatterproof, better looking than glass. I love them and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Walker

customer_reviews.title: The drinking edge of the cup is thin, and thus sharp, so be careful with it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses, but as others have posted, the top edge is sharp. I haven’t had any issues drinking from the cup, but I’d be careful swirling my finger around the top as it’s definitely thin enough to cut with. And yes, these cups are 4.5” tall. That explains how they can hold 18 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great set of wine glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors!! I wanted stemless, something that wouldn't break, and something that would look pretty on my wine bar! Nailed it!! Haven't put them through the dishwasher, so I don't know how they'll hold up, but hand washing works just as well! The stainless steel inside helps keep drinks cooler a bit longer too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Wine Glasses Set of 4 Large & Elegant 18 Oz. are a good value
customer_reviews.text: Stainless Steel Wine Glasses Set of 4 Large & Elegant 18 Oz. are a good value. I bought them for our beach front condo and they work great. Really don't want to take glass out on the patio or beach.
customer_reviews.author: MTBNortheast

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses, I mean what do you call them not being made of glass... Spectacular. I love the feel, look, and just drinking it of them. So classy and they won't break :) I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very Good -  Adds Elegance to Every Party
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses very much. Very good construction and keeps wine cool for a long time. I receive compliments on them everytime I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Zetak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a set after asking a friends where they purchased theirs. Are great for using indoors and out. Would highly recommend them for yourselves or to use as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: jac

customer_reviews.title: The design is great. I will say that the lips of two ...
customer_reviews.text: These are truly indestructible. So if you live with a klutz or a drunk, these are genius. The design is great. I will say that the lips of two of them were a little sharp - we had to sand down / soften the edges a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp lip and Taller than stated
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers have a very sharp edge. One must be careful not to cut one's lip while sipping. Also the description states they are 3.75" tall, but they are 4.5" tall. The stainless is thin, I'm not sure they're double-walled--ideal for insulation. I've returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice, just wish the shipping was better
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped in its original box. A little flimsy. Box cam open and a little crushed. My address label was stuck on the box, but not in a way to keep the box shut?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice stainless steel, but the rim is a bit sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these cups, but they do tip easily, and the rim is a bit sharp on the mouth. Not a comfortable feel on our mouths. But the stainless steel aspect is nice and good quality. I will go for a rolled edge from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice stemless wine glasses. And durable, you can't get any more durable than these. And a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney G. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good for more than 🍷
customer_reviews.text: These little cups are nice to keep wine cool and great for grandkid milkshakes. My only observation is that if you are drinking in the humid outdoors- the cup will “sweat” or get condensation on outside - which will make them a little hard to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Like to serve wine
customer_reviews.text: Like to serve wine? Tired of replacing stemmed glassware? This is a terrific answer. Durable, attractive and weighted well (stay upright). Use these a lot for picnic/outdoor drinking including soft drinks and lemonades... Packaged well, timely delivery, well done! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jill K S

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are legit!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are the real deal! They hold anything cold superbly, very classy looking and all my wine friends loved them!!! Wash easily, don't hold fingerprints, am buying more.

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on the patio
customer_reviews.text: We do not allow glass on our patio so these metal wine glasses are great! The only downside is they have to be hand washed and I usually put everything in the dishwasher. But they are durable and useful for outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Quality cups

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Wine Glasses - Set of 4 Large & Elegant 18 Oz. Premium Grade 18/8 Stainless Steel Red & White Stemless Wine Glasses, Unbreakable, Portable Wine Tumbler, for Outdoor Events, Picnics
feature_bullets: Set of 4 stainless steel stemless wine tumbler ideal for drinking chilled red and white wines! No need to worry about wine glass shattering; these stainless steel cups are made of fine-grade 18/8 gauge break-proof stainless steel.

The stainless steel wine glasses stemless stout bulb shape feels natural and comfortable when cradled in the hand, while also allowing wines to breathe enhancing flavors and releasing its decadent aromas.

Unlike glass cups, these stemless glasses retain your beverages room temperature for a crisp, refreshing drink with each sip. Not only are these drinking tumblers ideal for the home, they are also great for camping, picnics, and other outdoor events.
This set of stainless steel tumblers would make an excellent present for wine connoisseurs. Their smooth exterior is great for engraving for a special, personal touch.

Makes an excellent Christmas, holiday, birthday, and occasion gift for a special someone. This drinkware set washes simply by hand or in the dishwasher. Whiskey cup dimensions 3.75” tall with a 18 ounce capacity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars952 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
